wrath.common.world

Class Location

  • java.lang.Object
    • wrath.common.world.Location
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Location
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class to keep track of World coordinates.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Location

        public Location(double x,
                double y,
                World world)
        2D Descriptor for a Location.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate (Across top edge).
        y - The Y coordinate (Down the side).
        world - The World object the Location is linked to, can be null.

      • Location

        public Location(double x,
                double y,
                double z,
                World world)
        3D Descriptor for a Location.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate (Left/Right).
        y - The Y coordinate (Forward/Backwards/Depth).
        z - The Z coordinate (Height).
        world - The World object the Location is linked to, can be null.

    • Method Detail

      • decrementX

        public double decrementX(double sub)
        Adds specified amount to the X coordinate and returns the new value of X.
        Parameters:
        sub - The amount to remove from the X coordinate.
        Returns:
        Returns the new value of the X coordinate.

      • decrementY

        public double decrementY(double sub)
        Adds specified amount to the Y coordinate and returns the new value of Y.
        Parameters:
        sub - The amount to remove from the Y coordinate.
        Returns:
        Returns the new value of the Y coordinate.

      • decrementZ

        public double decrementZ(double sub)
        Adds specified amount to the Z coordinate and returns the new value of Z.
        Parameters:
        sub - The amount to remove from the Z coordinate.
        Returns:
        Returns the new value of the Z coordinate.

      • getDistance

        public double getDistance(Location compareTo)
        Gets the distance as a double between this location and the one specified.
        Parameters:
        compareTo - The Location to calculate the distance to.
        Returns:
        Returns the distance of the two Locations in double.

      • getWorld

        public World getWorld()
        Gets the World object attached to the Location. This can be null.
        Returns:
        Returns the World object attached to the Location.

      • getX

        public double getX()
        Gets the X Coordinate attached to the Location.
        Returns:
        Returns the X Coordinate attached to the Location.

      • getY

        public double getY()
        Gets the Y Coordinate attached to the Location.
        Returns:
        Returns the Y Coordinate attached to the Location.

      • getZ

        public double getZ()
        Gets the Z Coordinate attached to the Location (3D Only).
        Returns:
        Returns the Z Coordinate attached to the Location.
